All CorpTV playlists

The All {{ site.product_short }} playlists page lists all of the {{ site.product_short }} playlists that have been created using {{ site.product_short }} Classic.

Create a playlist

Manual Playlists can be created to group a series of videos where you control the order of playback.

  1. Click Create playlist.

Details

Smart Playlists can be created to automatically group a series of videos based upon video tag.

  1. Click Create playlist.

Delete playlists
  1. Select a playlist.
  2. Click .
Upload videos
  1. Click Upload Videos in the left navigation.
  2. Choose an Ingest Profile.
  3. Browse and select videos to upload.
